name: Wisp Child
description:
Mylo, a young alchemist studying under the wing of Ademia, has lived their whole life sheltered from the outside world. The quiet village they call home never truly accepted them. Ademia, ever protective, keeps Mylo inside and away from the influence of others.

Determined to prove themselves to both Ademia and the village, Mylo decides to wield the most dangerous alchemy of all: wisps. The most fundamental force of nature, wisps are what create and grow all life. But their power comes at a cost…

Embark on an adventure full of whimsy and intrigue, taking Mylo from beautiful forests to tranquil medieval homes. Discover the true nature of wisps, and even gain the ability to control them and fight enemies. And finally, help Mylo and Ademia save the villagers’ Cider Festival and repair their troubled relationship.


Gaze upon a beautiful fantasy world, with gorgeous 2D art and immersive visual effects.


Control wisps and use them to make objects come to life. Solve puzzles with these living objects to continue your adventure.


Fight against monsters that are threatening the village in this Zelda-inspired action adventure title.


Follow a gripping story full of mystery with Mylo, Ademia, and other fun characters.
